mapper.insert: insert into t_vision_test ( eye_id, date_time, device_type, distance, env_light_intensity, time_duration, test_mode, test_id, remark ) values ( #{eyeId}, #{dateTime}, #{deviceType}, #{distance}, #{envLightIntensity}, #{timeDuration}, #{testMode}, #{testId}, #{remark} )
